title: "Robot designed to mimic loved one’s expressions will be available within five years for reasonable price"
excerpt: "A new kind of robot designed to look like a loved one and mimic their expressions could be available to buy within a few years – and at a reasonable price, according to its creator. Researchers have developed an ‘interactive biomimicking’ head that uses artificial intelligence and a camera to assess the facial emotions and body movements of the person in front of it."
